title: Ep 129: Get Technical with Adda Birnir
itunes:title: Ep 129: Get Technical with Adda Birnir
itunes:subtitle: Kate’s feeling down, but finds solace in finishing a bottle of face mist, and Doree’s got some pop culture reccs to share. They also give an update on their social justice initiatives before speaking to Adda Birnir (Founder and CEO of SkillCrush) who e...
description:
Kate’s feeling down, but finds solace in finishing a bottle of face mist, and Doree’s got some pop culture reccs to share. They also give an update on their social justice initiatives before speaking to Adda Birnir (Founder and CEO of SkillCrush) who expands on how she overcame her fear of failing, her experiences getting laid off, her love of a good sourdough starter, and how the skills she learned in tech are reflected in other parts of her life.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, call or text 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com. For info on Forever35 Office Hours, click here.
